June 11, 1944 D Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class A)
Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class A) 10 March Contest (Music and Inspection Points) Belle Vue Marching Contest belle-vue-marching-contest
March Contest (Music and Inspection Points)
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK
Deportment in conjunction with Section B - 1st Barrow Shipyard, 2nd Sheffield Transport, 3rd 22nd Batt West Riding H.G.(Brighouse), 4th Bolton Borough. 9 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 11:10 a.m. Sept. 28, 2013, 9:53 a.m.
1 Barrow Shipyard Band Herbert Sutcliffe
2 Horwich RMI Unknown
3 Fairfield (Buxton) Band Unknown
4 Sheffield Transport Department Unknown
